title: Bug 17703 - EditAdd Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When selecting a compilation unit (CU) in the packages view and executing the 'File -> Add Task' action, a dialog different from the one shown when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu is displayed.
EB: The 'File -> Add Task' action should display the same dialog regardless of whether it is executed from the packages view or the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
1. Open the packages view.
2. Select a compilation unit (CU) by pressing F1.
3. Execute the 'File -> Add Task' action.
4. Observe that a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
